How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • App Engine for community health worker records and clinic data
  • Flow Designer to automate patient visit reminders and report submissions
  • IntegrationHub for syncing SMS or WhatsApp updates from field agents
  • Performance Analytics for visualizing coverage gaps
  • Mobile App Framework for offline data capture in low-connectivity areas

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Twilio SMS or WhatsApp API would be required. The OpenMRS API for clinical data import can also be used, but it's optional.

 

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Training non-technical health staff and ensuring patient data privacy and access reliability without an internet connection.
